item.title: Bitcoin Magazine CEO: Aims to Raise Up to $200 Million to Support BTC-Related Political Initiatives, Propelling BTC to $10 Million
item.description: On August 5th, David Bailey, the CEO of Bitcoin Magazine, announced on social media a plan to raise an amount ranging from $100 million to $200 million to provide support for Bitcoin-related political initiatives. The aim is to drive the Bitcoin price to $10 million.

item.title: If Bitcoin drops below $113,000, the mainstream CEX long liquidation volume will reach $944 million.
item.description: On August 5th, according to Coinglass data, in the event that Bitcoin drops below $113,000, the cumulative intensity of long liquidation on mainstream CEXs will reach $944 million.On the other hand, if Bitcoin rebounds above $115,000, the cumulative intensity of short liquidation on mainstream CEXs will reach $77.28 million.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not display the exact number of contracts awaiting liquidation or the exact value of contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent liquidation clusters, which is referred to as intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what extent reaching a certain price level will have an impact. Higher "liquidation bars" indicate that once the price reaches that level, a more intense reaction will occur due to a liquidity cascade.

item.title: Hyperliquid: Multiple Whales Withdraw Over $10 Million USDC Again, Short ETH Whale Realizes $13 Million Loss After Reducing Position
item.description: On August 5th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight, in the past 6 hours, several whale addresses carried out large USDC withdrawals. Additionally, a whale adjusted its ETH short position and still maintained a floating loss of more than $13 million:【Large Withdrawals】The whale address starting with 0xe86b05 withdrew $3 million USDC;The whale address starting with 0xe506B8 withdrew $2.23 million USDC;The whale address starting with 0x72b744 withdrew $2.85 million USDC;The whale address starting with 0x2ac1fA3 withdrew $2 million USDC.(Total withdrawals: approximately $10.08 million USDC)【Contract Position Change】The whale address 0x20c2d9 reduced its ETH short position by 655.29 coins. Currently, it is facing a floating loss of $13.11 million, and the latest liquidation price is $4,902.7.

item.title: Mantle Sees $388M ETH Reserve, Stablecoin Cap Soars 22.85%, $MNT Jumps 25%
item.description: Money is flowing into Mantle(@Mantle_Official) — stablecoin macp on Mantle has surged 22.85% in the past 7 days, reaching $653.51M. Mantle (@Mantle_Official) is now listed on the Strategic ETH Reserve and contributes 101,867 $ETH($388M). Meanwhile, $MNT is up nearly 25% today.

item.title: Meme project BigStrategy Inc. first-round purchased 2 million WLFI tokens and added them to the project's treasury for long-term holding
item.description: On August 5th, as per official channels, the BSC-based meme project BigStrategy Inc. (BSTR) announced that it has accomplished the first acquisition of 2 million WLFI via off-exchange OTC. This acquisition will be held as a treasury reserve for the long term. According to the widespread predictions within the community, the initial circulation ratio of WLFI is approximately 5%. In the context of a very low overall available supply, this reserve provides BigStrategy Inc. with a relatively abundant early allocation and a long-term holding foundation.It is reported that this portion of WLFI will be kept in the project's treasury for the long term, and all future earnings generated will be distributed on-chain to BSTR shareholders in proportion to their holdings. This reserve has been completed, and the details have been publicly disclosed on the official website.BigStrategy Inc. is the first project to operate in the form of an on-chain company and implement the "WLFI Microstrategy" m

item.title: Meme Market Watch: New Coin DUMP on Solana, Bucky Market Cap Surges Temporarily, Base Chain NET and QR See Increased Trading Activity
item.description: August 5th. According to GMGN data, within the past 6 hours on the Solana blockchain in the "Next Blue Chip" sector, the top five tokens in terms of market capitalization are PUMP, MarsMi, DUMP, Ani, and Bucky. Here, DUMP has been listed for less than 24 hours. It has a low trading volume and either has fewer than a thousand holding addresses or poses significant risks.On the other hand, on the Base chain, in the past 24 hours, the top five tokens by trading volume released on Clanker are BNKR, CLANKER, Fartcoin, NET, and QR. The latter two are newly on the list and have been performing exceptionally well these days.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins often lack practical use cases and experience significant price volatility. Therefore, investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: Opinion: Ethereum ETF Sees Record Single-Day Net Outflow, Signaling Short-Term Profit Taking, Not Institutional Waning
item.description: August 5th. In relation to yesterday's largest single-day net outflow of a U.S. Ethereum spot ETF, Nick Ruck, the research director of LVRG, stated: "Although this might suggest profit-taking following ETH's recent price surge, it does not necessarily imply a decline in institutional demand. Particularly when considering the industry's record $5.4 billion inflow in July and the corporate accumulation of ETH."Vincent Liu, the chief information officer of Kronos Research, also holds a similar view. "This trend reflects short-term profit-taking and the fluctuation of risk aversion sentiment rather than a rejection of long-term ETH holdings." (The Block)

item.title: HTX DeepThink: Fed's Unwillingness to Provide Clear Guidance on Easing Triggers Short-Term Market Shock, "Collapse" in Employment Data Prompts Reassessment of Rate Cut Expectations
item.description: On August 5th, HTX DeepThink columnist and HTX Research researcher Chloe (@ChloeTalk1) pointed out in her analysis that during the July FOMC meeting, the interest rate was kept at 5.25%–5.50% and no guidance was provided on future interest rate cuts, which triggered market concerns about "sustaining high interest rates for a longer period." Subsequently, the 10-year U.S. Treasury bond yield rose to 4.24%, the U.S. dollar index returned above 100, gold fell below $3,270, and Bitcoin retraced to the $116,000 range in the short term. Meanwhile, on-chain activity also decreased synchronously.The July non-farm payroll report unexpectedly saw a "cliff-like decline": only 73,000 new jobs were added, falling short of the expected 180,000. Moreover, the employment data for May and June were revised downward by about 90% in total. The reality of a "systemic overestimation" of the labor market promptly led the market to quickly reassess the Fed's policy path. As a result, the CME FedWatch inter

item.title: Linea will integrate the Lido V3 staking-as-a-Service infrastructure to enable its L2 native rewards.
item.description: On August 5th, as per official channels, Linea is set to integrate the Lido V3 stVault infrastructure in order to assist in achieving Linea's sustainable non-custodial DeFi engine. This ensures that all bridged ETH automatically accrues staking rewards.It is reported that Lido will offer customized services for staking bridged ETH and direct the rewards to Linea's LP and DeFi while maintaining trustless access and withdrawals. All ETH deposited into Linea will be staked through the Lido V3 stVault managed by Linea.

item.title: South Korean internet giant Kakao has established a Stablecoin Special Working Group
item.description: On August 5th, as per Daily Economic News, the South Korean internet behemoth Kakao has formed a special task force for stablecoins. The CEO of Kakao, Shina Chung, the CEO of Kakao Pay, Shin Won-keun, and the CEO of Kakao Bank, Yoon Ho-young, will participate in weekly meetings to deliberate on various situations and tasks associated with the project. Other subsidiaries such as Kakao Games are anticipated to join in the future. Additionally, a task force involving grassroots employees from its subsidiaries has been established to actively drive the proposed agenda forward.
